uv20:11: krodhaṁ jahed utpatitaṁ rāgaṁ jātaṁ nivārayet ।
uv20:15: krodhaṁ hatvā sukhaṁ sete krodhaṁ hatvā na śocati ।
uv20:19: vadham āryāḥ praśaṁsanti taṁ ca hatvā na śocati ।।
uv20:21: yat tu rocayati kruddho duṣkṛtaṁ sukṛtaṁ tv iti ।
uv20:23: paścāt sa vigate krodhe spṛṣṭvāgnim iva tapyate ।।
uv20:27: krodhena hy abhibhūtasya dvīpaṁ nāstīha kiṁ cana ।। [i]
uv20:31: krodhena cābhibhūtasya na dvīpo bhavati kaś cana ।। [ii]
uv20:33: abalaṁ hi balaṁ tasya yasya krodhe balaṁ balam ।
uv20:37: yas tv ayaṁ balavāṁ bhūtvā durbalasya titīkṣati ।
uv20:39: tām āhuḥ paramāṁ kṣāntiṁ nityaṁ kṣamati durbalaḥ ।।
uv20:41: yaḥ pareṣāṁ prabhūḥ saṁs tu durbalāṁ saṁtitīkṣati ।
uv20:43: tām āhuḥ paramāṁ kṣāntiṁ nityaṁ kṣamati durbalaḥ ।।
uv20:45: atyukto hi parair yo vai balavāṁ saṁtitīkṣati ।
uv20:47: tām āhuḥ paramāṁ kṣāntiṁ nityaṁ kṣamati durbalaḥ ।।
uv20:49: ātmānaṁ ca paraṁ caiva mahato rakṣate bhayāt ।
uv20:51: yaḥ paraṁ kupitaṁ jñātvā svayaṁ tatropaśāmyati ।।
uv20:53: ubhayoś carate so ’rtham ātmanasya parasya ca ।
uv20:55: yaḥ paraṁ kupitaṁ jñātvā svayaṁ tatropaśāmyati ।।
uv20:57: ubhārthe caramāṇaṁ taṁ hy ātmanasya parasya ca ।
uv20:61: jayaṁ hi manyate bālo vacobhiḥ paruṣair vadan ।
uv20:63: nityam iva jayas tasya yo ’tivākyaṁ titīkṣati ।।
uv20:73: kruddho vācaṁ na bhāṣeta pariṣatsv atha vā mithaḥ ।
uv20:75: krodhābhibhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ svam arthasṁ hi na budhyate ।।
uv20:77: satyaṁ vaden na ca krudhyed dadyād alpād api svayam ।
uv20:79: sthānair ebhis tribhir yukto devānām antikaṁ vrajet ।।
uv20:81: śāntasya hi kutaḥ krodho dāntasya samajīvinaḥ ।
uv20:85: tasyaiva pāpaṁ bhavati yaḥ kruddhe krudhyate punaḥ ।
uv20:87: kruddheṣv akruddhamānas tu saṁgrāmaṁ durjayaṁ jayet ।।
uv20:89: akrodhena jayet krodham asādhuṁ sādhunā jayet ।
uv20:91: jayet kadaryaṁ dānena satyena tv anṛtaṁ jayet ।।
uv20:97: akrodhaś cāvihiṁsā ca vasaty āryeṣu sarvadā ।
uv20:99: sadā pāpajane krodhas tiṣṭhati parvato yathā ।।
uv20:101: yas tv ihotpatitaṁ krodhaṁ rathaṁ bhrāntam iva dhārayet ।
uv20:103: vadāmi sārathiṁ taṁ tu raśmigrāho ’yam anyathā ।।
uv20:107: udakaṁ puṣpaṁ aśvaś-ca saha krodhena te daśaḥ ।। ।।
